name: Blockugram - Block Puzzle Game
description:
How many pictures can you create using blocks? Test yourself in this new block puzzle game Blockugram! You’ll never get bored when there are so many mystery pictures for you to reveal!

How to play:
* Drag the colored blocks one by one to the board.
* Find the unique fit for each block and combine them on the board.
* Match the blocks on the board by colors and shapes.
* Use hints to speed up your progress if you get stuck.
* Fill up the board and reveal a picture.

Why plays Blockugram?
Blockugram picture puzzle is an ideal pastime for people who wish to train their brain in a fun and relaxing way. Whenever you feel tired or moody, take a break with Blockugram puzzle and feel recharged right away. Discover tons of picture block puzzles from different categories tailored to suit every taste.

Play this eye-pleasing brain teaser anytime, anywhere!
